title: Kits
subtitle: Your combat specialization and starting gear

content.text: Your Kit is your entry point into the augment system. It gives you a starting augment tree, a free T1 augment, a kit ability, starting gear, and a recommended stat lean. Choose one kit or go Custom.

kits.name: Berserker
kits.gear: Heavy Axe, Combat Knife, Contractor Standard
kits.desc: Close distance, hit hard, take hits. Pain is fuel.

kits.name: Operative
kits.gear: Corp Rifle, Burst Pistol, Light Weave
kits.desc: Shoot first, shoot accurately, control sightlines.

kits.name: Channeler
kits.gear: Rift Staff, Combat Knife, Rift-Walker Suit
kits.desc: Reshape the battlefield with dimensional energy.

kits.name: Technician
kits.gear: Burst Pistol, Neural Probe, Corp Tactical
kits.desc: Hack systems, disrupt augments, support the crew.

kits.name: Negotiator
kits.desc: Talk your way through. Every problem has a price.

kits.name: Bulwark
kits.desc: Stand in front. Absorb damage. Protect your crew.

kits.name: Phantom
kits.desc: Move unseen. Strike from ambush. Disappear.

kits.name: Dancer
kits.desc: Dual-wield, move constantly, strike from every angle.

kits.name: Leech
kits.desc: Mainline rift contamination for power. Burn and bleed.

kits.name: Sin Eater
kits.gear: Siphon Rod, Combat Knife, Light Weave
kits.desc: Pull suffering from allies. Redirect it at enemies.

kits.name: Brawler
kits.desc: No weapons needed. Your fists are the weapon. Close, hit, shove.
